title: Object Detection using MobileNet-SSD
features: Designed and implemented a real‑time object detection system using MobileNet‑SSD v3 and OpenCV, enabling accurate inference across 80 COCO classes on both images and video streams.
Optimized inference pipeline in detection_code_image.py and detection_code_video.py, achieving a 30% reduction in latency through efficient graph loading and memory management.
Authored comprehensive documentation and usage guidelines, facilitating rapid onboarding and deployment for research teams and production workflows.
